name: dovel
description: Dovel Server is a self-hosted email service platform that combines modern webmail, spam filtering, and admin tools. It aims to make running personal or small-business mail infrastructure easier while keeping full control of data.
features: Webmail interface: Access email through a modern browser-based client with responsive design for mobile and desktop.
Spam filtering: Block unwanted messages using SpamAssassin, DNS blacklists, and customizable filtering rules.
Domain management: Host email for multiple domains with separate user accounts and mailbox configurations.
SMTP and IMAP: Send and receive email using standard protocols compatible with all mail clients and devices.
Admin dashboard: Manage users, domains, and server settings through a centralized web-based control panel.
Virus scanning: Scan incoming and outgoing messages for malware using ClamAV integration for security.
Backup tools: Schedule automatic backups of mailboxes and configuration for disaster recovery protection.
TLS encryption: Secure email transmission with automatic certificate management and encrypted connections.
